00036 #ifndef CURRENTFUNCTION_H_
00037 #define CURRENTFUNCTION_H_
00038 
00039 #include "Object.h"
00040 
00041 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00042 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00043 inline void currentFunctionHelper() {
00044 #if defined(__GNUC__) || (defined(__MWERKS__) && (__MWERKS__ >= 0x3000)) || (defined(__ICC) && (__ICC >= 600))
00045 #define S_CURRENT_FUNCTION __PRETTY_FUNCTION__
00046 #elif defined(__DMC__) && (__DMC__ >= 0x810)
00047 #define S_CURRENT_FUNCTION __PRETTY_FUNCTION__
00048 #elif defined(__FUNCSIG__)
00049 #define S_CURRENT_FUNCTION __FUNCSIG__
00050 #elif (defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) && (__INTEL_COMPILER >= 600)) || (defined(__IBMCPP__) && (__IBMCPP__ >= 500))
00051 #define S_CURRENT_FUNCTION __FUNCTION__
00052 #elif defined(__BORLANDC__) && (__BORLANDC__ >= 0x550)
00053 #define S_CURRENT_FUNCTION __FUNC__
00054 #elif defined(__STDC_VERSION__) && (__STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901)
00055 #define S_CURRENT_FUNCTION __func__
00056 #else
00057 #define S_CURRENT_FUNCTION "(unknown)"
00058 #endif
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00063 
00064 
00065 #endif  /* CURRENTFUNCTION_H_ */
